author: cnbc.com
title: SWBC Mortgage Corporation’s Loan Officers Named in Scotsman Guide Rankings
text:
SAN ANTONIO--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- SWBC Mortgage Corporation is excited to announce that six of its originators achieved national rankings across several key mortgage criteria by the Scotsman Guide . The mortgage loan officers were recognized among more than 3,000 entrants for their achievements in 2017.
Shane Siniard , NMLS# 246046 Senior Loan officer in Cartersville, GA, ranked for Top Dollar Volume and Most Loans Closed. Amanda Sessa , NMLS# 257356 Senior Loan Officer in Boulder, CO, ranked for Top Dollar Volume. Jimmy Alexander , NMLS# 216006 Assistant Branch Manager in Killeen, TX, ranked for Top Dollar Volume and Most Loans Closed. Kelli Broadbent , NMLS# 280462 Senior Loan Officer in Denver, CO, ranked for Top Dollar Volume. Phillip Miller , NMLS# 248915 Branch Manager in Nashville, TN, ranked for Top Dollar Volume.
Siniard and Robert Camras , NMLS# 189578 Branch Manager in Hot Springs, AR, were both named 2018 Best Mortgage Lenders by State. Siniard ranked No. 1 in Georgia, and Camras ranked No. 1 in Arkansas.
“We are proud of our loan officers and the job they do on a daily basis,” said Susan Stewart, CEO of SWBC Mortgage Corporation. “We highly value the important role they have in creating and maintaining relationships with our clients and referral partners, and SWBC Mortgage remains committed to providing the best tools and support to assure their continued success.”
The Scotsman Guide ranks the nation's top mortgage producers. To be eligible for initial consideration in the Top Originators rankings, originators must have had at least $40 million in loan volume or 100 closed home loans for the 2017 calendar year. After receiving submissions, Scotsman Guide required written verification of top entrants’ volume data from a certified public accountant, the chief financial officer at the originator's company, or a similar source.
About SWBC Mortgage Corporation
SWBC Mortgage Corporation ( www.swbcmortgage.com ) is a full-service mortgage lender approved with FNMA, FHLMC, and GNMA. Headquartered in San Antonio, Texas, SWBC Mortgage has been providing mortgage banking services since 1988. Through the ups and downs of the mortgage industry, the mortgage corporation has remained committed to service, integrity, and stability in 39 states. Today, SWBC Mortgage is consistently recognized as one of the top 100 lenders in America and is home to numerous top-ranking originators. SWBC Mortgage credits its superior performance and growth to a commitment to quality service and to its highly experienced team members—many of whom have been employed by SWBC Mortgage for more than 15 years. SWBC Mortgage’s innovative TurnKey ® app is an online point-of-sale tool that vastly streamlines and simplifies the mortgage application process, creating a superior user experience, thus making the process easy for potential or existing customers seeking to purchase or refinance a property. Building on its rich history, the mortgage corporation continues to adapt to the changing industry and seek out new expansion opportunities.
About SWBC
Headquartered in San Antonio, SWBC is a diversified financial services company providing a wide range of insurance, mortgage, and investment services to financial institutions, businesses, and individuals. With offices across the country, SWBC is committed to providing quality products, outstanding service, and customized solutions in all 50 states. For more information, visit SWBC’s website at www.swbc.com .
